column1: English Sent: The physical features of India can be grouped under the following physiographic divisions (Figure 2SYMBOL-DOT4): (1) The Himalayan Mountains (2) The Northern Plains (3) The Peninsular Plateau (4) The Indian Desert (5) The Coastal Plains (6) The Islands
